title: Transparent Aurelie logo lockup asset + header/footer branding swap

requirements.summary: Generate a tightly cropped transparent PNG logo lockup from the uploaded brand image and add it as a static frontend asset.
acceptanceCriteria: A new PNG file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/` created from `1770306231356.png`.
The new PNG contains only the logo + “Aurelie” + “Fine Jewellery” with a transparent background (alpha channel), with no visible beige/cream background around the mark.
The crop is tight with modest padding so no parts of the mark are cut off.

file_operations.description: Create the cropped transparent logo lockup PNG from `1770306231356.png` per image edit requirement (remove background to alpha; include flower-like logo + “Aurelie” + “Fine Jewellery” only).

requirements.summary: Update the header branding image to use the new transparent logo lockup asset without changing existing header behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Header logo `` `src` points to the new generated asset path under `/assets/generated/`.
Header branding renders correctly at both scroll states (`h-16` and `h-20`) with no background box/edge visible behind the mark.

file_operations.description: Replace the header branding `` source from `/assets/1770304385246~2.png` to `/assets/generated/aurelie-lockup-transparent.dim_1000x320.png`, keeping sticky header, scroll-resize behavior, and navigation button behavior unchanged.

requirements.summary: Replace the footer brand block with a single transparent logo lockup image while keeping the rest of the footer unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer brand section no longer renders `/assets/1770214375269~2-2.png` or separate “Aurelie”/“Fine Jewellery” text nodes.
Footer brand section renders the new generated transparent asset under `/assets/generated/` as a single ``.
Footer layout remains aligned and responsive (no overflow or broken spacing on mobile and desktop).

file_operations.description: Update the left-column brand block to render a single `` using `/assets/generated/aurelie-lockup-transparent.dim_1000x320.png`, removing the existing small logo image and the separate “Aurelie”/“Fine Jewellery” text nodes; keep all other footer content, links, and structure unchanged.
